name: simplex-chat
description: SimpleX Chat is a privacy-focused messaging platform with E2E encryption and no identifiers. It provides mobile and desktop clients, and can use self-hosted servers as transport nodes.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Operates without phone numbers, emails, or usernames for maximum privacy

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Encrypts all messages, calls, and files with double-ratchet protocol

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own relay servers for complete control over message routing

features.title: Disappearing Messages
features.description: Sets automatic message deletion after specified time periods

features.title: Group Chats
features.description: Creates encrypted group conversations with admin controls

features.title: Voice And Video Calls
features.description: Supports encrypted audio and video calls between users

features.title: File Sharing
features.description: Sends encrypted files and media through the chat interface

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Available on Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android
